entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 06 February 2023
